titles.title: I Surrender All (familiar hymn of the church)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I surrender all I surrender all All to Thee my blessed Savior I surrender all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All to Jesus I surrender All to Him I freely give I will ever love and trust Him In His presence daily live{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All to Jesus I surrender Humbly at His feet I bow Worldly pleasures all forsaken Take me Jesus Take me now{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All to Jesus I surrender Make me Savior wholly Thine Let me feel Thy Holy Spirit Truly know that Thou art mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All to Jesus I surrender Lord I give myself to Thee Fill me with Thy love and power Let Thy blessing fall on me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All to Jesus I surrender Now I feel the sacred flame Oh the joy of full salvation Glory glory to His name{/lang-eng}
